info.name: Neutral Dark Gray for Ipernity, Part 1/2
info.description: Neutral Dark Gray style for Ipernity, a photo sharing site. In addition to being dark, the overall feel is more interactive, including dynamic number of columns in thumbnails views, which reduces the need for scrolling. The size of the style exceeds Stylish maximum, so it is split in two parts. All you have to do is download and activate them both.
info.additionalInfo:
Part 1 includes:

– Common parts of the interface
– Home
– Guestbook
– News
– Your photos
– Single photo
– Albums

Parts 1 and 2 together cover the whole interface. Since it is virtually impossible to wade through it all with every possible variation, there may be original white popups or boxes lurking somewhere. If you spot one, please drop me a line in ipernity mail and I'll try to fix it. I have no ipernity club membership, so members may find something missing. Note that Ipernity uses standard Javascript popups here and there; they cannot be changed. You’ll recognize them by the light gray bottom area.

Code is heavily commented to accommodate for your own edits.

Even though both parts work as standalone, part 2 is pretty much useless by itself.

V.1.03 fixes image caption not showing in the main single image page.
